articles.title: Warren Buffett, Berkshire could invest $33 billion in under 18 months - Markets Insider
articles.description: The famed investor's company has snapped up Occidental Petroleum and HP stock in recent weeks, and struck a nearly $12 billion deal to buy Alleghany.
articles.content:
Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway is on track to invest more than $33 billion in the space of 18 months.
